Posts.EditableText: I don´t get it. I test it again and again with the program and is all fine, works perfectly, but the moment I want to export the game to work on his own the window open but the game itself doesn´t start and a message pop out saying "Error launching game: Characters invalid." The only script I am using is "if Pagex.visited" and after that the game is fairly simple.
Posts.HTML: I don´t get it. I test it again and again with the program and is all fine, works perfectly, but the moment I want to export the game to work on his own the window open but the game itself doesn´t start and a message pop out saying "Error launching game: Characters invalid." The only script I am using is "if Pagex.visited" and after that the game is fairly simple.
